title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.7 - Administrative action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.7 - Administrative action

State Regulations
(a) When the department receives a no insurance (NIS) response from an insurance
company to a mandatory verification (MVF) transaction, the department shall
issue a registration suspension or 30-day revocation (FH only) and a driver's
license suspension, as applicable. Reason for suspension: invalid proof of
insurance submitted. (b) When the
department receives a NIS response for a MVF transaction generated by a report
of operation of a motor vehicle without insurance, the department shall issue a
one year revocation against the driver's license and/or registration as
prescribed by law and assess the civil penalties prescribed by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
32.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
